pollo.title: Paper Plane || animation
pollo.instructions:
-------------------
Click the flag multiple times to make it a bit smoother

I use she/her and they/them pronouns!

No ads! They will be removed and/or reported 
(Links to other projects and/or Just advertising)
And please don't spam
--------------------
How will you spread kindness today? :)

Here are some ideas:
- Give someone a compliment
- Tell them how special they are
- Hug them (remember to only hug those who have been near you because social distancing ^^ and just make sure they aren't sick AND don't hug strangers ;w;)
- Spend time with them
- Talk
- Make them a drawing
- Make them a paper plane with a message inside of it :)
--------------------
Music: i wish it would never stop snowing
Music by: sleepy fish
--------------------
Instructions: 
Watch :)
--------------------
Spread kindness ♡

It doesn't have to be something big, it can be a text, hug, or a smile
--------------------
Notes and credits:

Me for the art and animation ^^
Please don't repost or trace

@Anime-tions for inspiring me to make animations and art

WOOO 1 MINUTE OF ANIMATION not bad, not bad... also this took me a while-

Tag's: #art #music #animation #all #kind

Please don't remix if you aren't going to add anything or change it <3
--------------------
UPDATE: OMGGGG THIS GOT FEATURED!! ON MARCH 24TH AAAAA YAYY THANK YOU SO MUCH ST!!! i cAnT bEliEve iT
--------------------
By the way if you want to talk with me, I rather you talk to me on my profile! There's a very low chance I'll respond here (AKA on the project)  ;)


Thank you to @rishavscratchwork
